Posts.Content: What fabulous advice thank you so much for taking the time. It all seems so obvious but i never thought of any of it. I will try it all. X
Posts.Title: ANXIETY

Posts.Content: So overwhelmed by the lovely replies. Many thanks x
Posts.Title: ANXIETY

Posts.Content: I have been suffering from terrible anxiety attacks and it has really affected my confidence. Im normally very active running and fitness classes but after my 3rd chemo im just exhausted and have no appetite. My Dr has prescribed lorazepam which does help massively but im worried about taking too often so only take when Im desperate. I guess my anxiety is never feeling like myself again. Any advice or stories of comfort that it wont always be like this.
Posts.Title: ANXIETY
